body:
I've been compiling same software with different compilers in a few days. **canu** can be installed by gcc@8.3.0 and gcc@5.4.0 but by intel@19.0.4 not , some libraries I changed the way to compile with gcc@5.4.0 ,final the errors came.
```
$ spack install canu %intel@19.0.4 ^freetype%gcc@5.4.0 ^libcerf%gcc@5.4.0 ^harfbuzz%gcc@5.4.0
==> Installing canu
==> Searching for binary cache of canu
==> Finding buildcaches on http://spack.pi.sjtu.edu.cn/mirror
==> Warning: Spack will not check SSL certificates. You need to update your Python to enable certificate verification.
==> No binary for canu found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpclc/.spack/sourcecache/canu/canu-1.8.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpclc/spack/var/spack/stage/canu-1.8-iyv3zibj3ycus3yeakprlcdnz6qz26qt/v1.8.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpclc/spack/var/spack/stage/canu-1.8-iyv3zibj3ycus3yeakprlcdnz6qz26qt
==> Ran patch() for canu
==> Building canu [MakefilePackage]
==> Executing phase: 'edit'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j4' 'all' 'TARGET_DIR=/lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpclc/opt/sandybridge/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-19.0.4/canu-1.8-iyv3zibj3ycus3yeakprlcdnz6qz26qt'

4 errors found in build log:
     542                     from utgcns/libboost/boost/unordered/detail/equiva
            lent.hpp(15),
     543                     from utgcns/libboost/boost/unordered/unordered_set
            .hpp(18),
     544                     from utgcns/libboost/boost/unordered_set.hpp(17),
     545                     from utgcns/libboost/boost/graph/adjacency_list.hp
            p(21),
     546                     from utgcns/libpbutgcns/AlnGraphBoost.H(69),
     547                     from utgcns/libcns/unitigConsensus.C(77):
  >> 548    utgcns/libboost/boost/preprocessor/list/fold_left.hpp(37): catastro
            phic error: cannot open source file "boost/preprocessor/list/detail
            /edg/fold_left.hpp"
     549      #    include <boost/preprocessor/list/detail/edg/fold_left.hpp>
     550                                                                     ^
     551    
     552    compilation aborted for utgcns/libcns/unitigConsensus.C (code 4)
  >> 553    make: *** [/lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpclc/spack/var/spack/stage/canu-1
            .8-iyv3zibj3ycus3yeakprlcdnz6qz26qt/spack-src/Linux-amd64/obj/lib/l
            ibcanu.a/utgcns/libcns/unitigConsensus.o] Error 4
     554    make: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     555    In file included from utgcns/libboost/boost/preprocessor/control/wh
            ile.hpp(21),
     556                     from utgcns/libboost/boost/preprocessor/arithmetic
            /add.hpp(20),
     557                     from utgcns/libboost/boost/mpl/aux_/preprocessor/d
            ef_params_tail.hpp(66),
     558                     from utgcns/libboost/boost/mpl/aux_/na_spec.hpp(28
            ),
     559                     from utgcns/libboost/boost/mpl/if.hpp(19),
     560                     from utgcns/libboost/boost/type_traits/type_with_a
            lignment.hpp(11),
     561                     from utgcns/libboost/boost/optional/optional.hpp(3
            3),
     562                     from utgcns/libboost/boost/optional.hpp(15),
     563                     from utgcns/libboost/boost/format/internals.hpp(20
            ),
     564                     from utgcns/libboost/boost/format.hpp(38),
     565                     from utgcns/libpbutgcns/AlnGraphBoost.C(72):

            phic error: cannot open source file "boost/preprocessor/list/detail
            /edg/fold_left.hpp"

     568                                                                     ^

  >> 571    make: *** [/lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpclc/spack/var/spack/stage/canu-1
```

I hope to get a solution soon.
title: Installation issue：canu
